BoxShape.title: Why Join this Program?
BoxShape.box1desc: Only learning isn't the key, putting what you've learned into practice is the key to greater achievements. The best Data Science training in mumbai are endowed with this feature, which later helps to boost career prospects.
BoxShape.box2desc: Under the supervision of a counselor, create customized learning tracks according to your professional experience and career aspirations under our Data Science Certification Course in mumbai.
BoxShape.box3desc: Get a job at a top company or startup with a Guaranteed job referral. Learn from professionals in live-interactive sessions and get tips on how to create a resume and also prepare for an interview.
BoxShape.box4desc: The course is only open to professionals with at least one year of experience. The Data Science Course in mumbai with placement opportunities is a credible career heads-up.

Especially, with the aim to provide practical data science training learning experience with live interactive classes and projects.

chap.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Programming ( 3 hrs )
desc: Source code Vs bytecode Vs machine code, Compiler Vs Interpreter, C/C++, Java Vs Python.

chap.title: Chapter 3: python basics (1 hrs)
desc: Variable Vs Identifiers, Strings Operators Vs Operand, Procedure oriented Vs Modular programming.

chap.title: Chapter 4: statistics basics & probability (1 hrs)
desc: Measures of Central Tendency & dispersion, Inferential statistics and Sampling theory.

chap.title: Chapter 2: PYTHON INTRODUCTION (1 hrs)
desc: How a Python Program runs on our system?
Features of Python Memory Management in Python,

chap.title: Chapter 6: EXPECTION HANDELING

chap.title: Chapter 11: PANDAS IN PYTHON

chap.title: Chapter 13: Seaborn
desc: Working with seaborn on titanic dataset

chap.title: Chapter 1:- Probability theory and Statistical Inferences ( 4 hrs )
desc: Discrete Probability Distributions - Binomial, Poisson etc
Continuous Probability Distributions - Gaussian, Normal, etc

chap.title: Chapter 2: Statistics Foundations (1 hrs)
desc: Measures of Central tendency and Dispersion
Sampling theory and scales of measurement

chap.title: Chapter 3: Hypothesis Testing and its Applications (1 hrs)
desc: Basic Concepts - Formulation of Hypothesis, Making a decision
Advanced Concepts - Choice of Test - t test vs z test
Evaluation of Test - P value and Critical Value approach

chap.title: Chapter 4: Exploratory Data Analysis and the Art of Storytelling (1 hrs)
Chapter 1:A primer on Machine Learning ( 3 hrs )
desc: Types of Learning - Supervised, Unsupervised and Reinforcement
Types of Analysis - Descriptive, Predictive, and Prescriptive
Bias Variance Tradeoff - Overfitting vs Underfitting

chap.title: Chapter 2: Regression
desc: What is linear in Linear Regression?
Model Evaluation Metrics for regression problems - MAE, RMSE, MSE, and MAP

chap.title: Chapter 3: Classification
desc: Up sampling, Down sampling and SMOTE

chap.title: Chapter 4: Clustering-K means
desc: K Means Algorithms - Partition based model for clustering

chap.title: Chapter 5: KNN

Applications in Missing value imputes and Balancing datasets

chap.title: Chapter 7: Decision Trees

chap.title: Chapter 8: Ensemble Techniques
desc: Introduction to Bagging as an Ensemble technique
Bootstrap Aggregation and Out of Bag error
Random Forests and its Applications in Feature selection
How Bagging overcomes the overfitting problem?
How Boosting overcomes the Bias - Variance Tradeoff
Gradient Boosting and Xgboost as regularised boosting

chap.title: Chapter 11: Time-series Analysis
desc: The Random Walk model and Stationarity of Time Series
Tests for Stationarity - ADF and Dickey- Fuller test, AR, MA, ARIMA, SARIMA models
A regression approach to time series forecasting.

chap.title: Chapter 12: Machine Learning Pipeline & auto ML
desc: Serving the model via Rest API & Keras.

chap.title: Chapter 3: Deep Neural Networks
desc: Tools for deep learning models - Tflearn and Pytorch

chap.title: Chapter 4: Convolutional Neural networks
desc: Architecture and design of a Convolutional network,

desc: RN N & LSTM structure, Bidirectional RNNs and Applications on Sequential data
Advanced Time series forecasting using RNNs with LSTMs

chap.title: Chapter 6: Restricted Boltzmann Machines and Autoencoders.
desc: Application of RBMs in Collaborative filtering

chap.title: Chapter 1:- Language modelling
desc: N-gram Language models: Perplexity and Smoothing
Introduction to Hidden Markov models, Viterbi algorithms
MEMMs and CRFs for named entity recognition
Application of LSTMs to predict the next word.

chap.title: Chapter 3: Sequence to Sequence tasks
desc: NLP with machine translation for text analysis

desc: backend and  deployment process for chatbot

Review.title: Why should you enrol in our Data Science course ?

Furthermore, our Data Science courses are created for both creative and non-creative brains. So, enrol in our Artificial Intelligence and Data Science course and immerse yourself in a new era of learning!

Fee.desc: The Advanced Data science training institute in mumbai fees start from INR 65,000 (Excluding  GST). We aim to deliver to you quality education considering the aspect of feasibility.

FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.desc: Learn more about our Data Science courses in mumbai by reading the FAQs. Find out more about our Data Analyst course in mumbai costs, project certifications, and other Data Analyst and AI course information.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the different learning alternatives available for Data Science Course?
FaqDATA.ans: Most crucially, for the  Data Science course with real-world experience, we provide both offline and online learning options. Aside from that, they provide a blended learning curriculum tailored to the needs of working professionals. In addition, as part of their data science training, you may engage in live online sessions in hybrid learning mode. On top of that, you'll be doing some hands-on work on the industrial project site.Due to the epidemic, they can only provide completely online education via live sessions. This means you can communicate with your instructor in real time, just as you would in a regular face-to-face class. In addition, all practical sessions of their artificial intelligence and machine learning course will be held utilising cloud-based technologies at this time.

FaqDATA.ques: If I have to miss a lesson due to an emergency, would there be a make-up class available?
FaqDATA.ans: For starters, their Data Science course includes live online sessions. Additionally, all of their students have access to video recordings of those classes. Furthermore, they provide you with unrestricted access to these recorded sessions so that you may refer to them anytime you need theoretical assistance in your AI and ML career. As a consequence, you won't be disappointed if you miss any of our artificial intelligence and machine learning training's live sessions. They do, however, strongly suggest you attend all live sessions.

FaqDATA.ques: What is the Data Science course Scholarship Program at Skillslash?
FaqDATA.ans: First and foremost, each candidate will have the chance to complete a 20-minute online aptitude test. If a candidate has a score of more than 65 percent on the aptitude exam, he or she will be entitled for a 10% reduction on the course costs. Furthermore, applicants who lost their employment as a result of the COVID scenario, as well as moms who wish to start a profession, may be eligible for a scholarship of up to 100% based on their exam score.

FaqDATA.ans: If you are considered eligible for a scholarship, you may be able to save up to 30% on your fees for
FaqDATA.ansAfter: Moreover,we also offer scholarships to Covid-affected candidates, unemployed candidates, and mothers returning to the workforce after a vacation.

FaqDATA.ans: The hitch is that if you take the

FaqDATA.ques: What is Skillslash's Data Science Training institute in mumbai scholarship program?
FaqDATA.ans: First of all, every candidate will be given the opportunity to take a 20-minute online aptitude exam. If a candidate passes the aptitude exam with a score of more than 65 percent, he or she will be eligible for a 30 percent discount on the data science course fees. Besides, candidates who lost their jobs as a result of the COVID situation, as well as mothers who want to begin their careers, can receive up to a 100% scholarship based on their exam score.
